name: Acid Splash
description: A small orb of acid splashes a creature, dealing acid damage.

name: Detect Magic
description: Sense the presence of magic in an area.

name: Divine Lance
description: Strike a foe with your deityâ€™s alignment energy.

name: Electric Arc
description: Discharge electricity that arcs between two targets.

name: Heal
description: Restore Hit Points or damage undead.

name: Magic Missile
description: Fire one or more darts of magical force that automatically hit.

name: Bless
description: Allies gain +1 status bonus to attacks in the aura.

name: Fireball
description: A burst of flame explodes, dealing fire damage in a 20-ft radius.

name: Haste
description: Target gains an extra action each turn for Stride or Strike.
